function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparity in the correlation between physical activity reduction and psychological well-being","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in the built environment due to frequent behavioral changes and adjustments by retailers and consumers.","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of residential and commercial areas","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagaci\\u00f3n acelerada del virus debido a la falta de aislamiento social en pa\\u00edses afectados inicialmente.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmisi\\u00f3n de persona a persona del virus sars-cov-2 a trav\\u00e9s del contacto directo.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"}]}
